players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob, I think Diana is the mafioso because Alice was killed last night and Diana was investigated by me."
Diana: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game. Let's focus on finding the real mafia among us."
Diana: "I'm glad we're all working together to find the mafia in our midst. I have an alibi for Night 1, as I was investigating Charlie during that time."
